name: In-vivo Cortical Recording for eBRIC
citation: Du, Haoyang; Nishimura, Nozomi;  Bizimana, Laurie Anne (2025) In-vivo Cortical Recording for eBRIC (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI Archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001559/draft
description:
We recorded calcium dynamics in the somatosensory cortex using the eBRIC (enhanced bioluminescent red indicator for Ca2+) sensor. This work have been published in An Enhanced Red Bioluminescent Indicator for Responsive Detection of Physiological Calcium Dynamics in Cells and Mice, DOI: 10.1021/acssensors.5c01093. 

In this dataset we includes all the raw data presented in Figure 4 of the paper, including the python scripts used for analysis and for figure generation.
